column4: i dont know why my ubuntu runs bad my vista flys compared to ubuntu what would cause this?
no i have a ati radeon x200m, this is my laptop

- 1) you might need different drivers for your graphics adapter 2) you might have to less RAM (1.2GB minimum for acceptable performance) 3) you might not yet have discovered, in which way ubuntu is different in being slow compared to windows - each of them can be slow, but in different situations - use ubuntu for at least 10 days and you will discover the pattern, i mean.
- disabling some unneeded services might help a little, too.
